powers.name: Invincibility
powers.content:
## Description Make yourself immune to damages | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Damage Resistance 1**
Gives you +3 armour | | 2 | 1 | **Damage Resistance 2**
Gives you +6 armour | | 3 | 1 | **Damage Resistance 3**
Gives you +9 armour | | 4 | 2 | **Damage Resistance 4**
Gives you +12 armour |

powers.name: Rage
powers.content:
## Description A double edged sword. | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Berserker**
-You take and deal double damage for the next combat encounter |

powers.name: Regeneration
powers.content:
## Description Your flesh will heal | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Flesh Regrowth**
-You regain 2 hp per round | | 1 | 1 | **Limb Regrowth**
-You heal from critical damage once a week |

powers.name: Super Strength
powers.content:
## Description Your might swells. | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Enhanced Strength**
-Gives you +2 strength | | 2 | 1 | **Superior Strength**
Gives you +4 strength | | 3 | 1 | **Heroic Strength**
Gives you +6 strength | | 4 | 2 | **Absolute Strength**
Gives you +10 strength |

powers.name: Vitality
powers.content:
## Description Your life swells. | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Enhanced Vitality 1**
Gives you +2 durability | | 2 | 1 | **Enhanced Vitality 2**
Gives you +4 durability | | 3 | 1 | **Enhanced Vitality 3**
Gives you +6 durability | | 4 | 2 | **Enhanced Vitality 4**
Gives you +10 durability |

powers.name: Bombard
powers.content:
## Description Blow it all away | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **OmniBlast**
-You explode causing 1d8 damage to everything around you. You can choose the damage type of the blast. |

powers.name: Disaster
powers.content:
## Description Indiscriminate firepower. | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Seismic**
-The land around you shakes causing enemies to fall prone and take 1d4 damage. They fall on a failed reflex check of 6. This affect happens to everyone but you in a 3 block radius. | | 1 | 1 | **Meteor**
-Summon a asteroid that falls on an enemy. The meteor does 1d20 damage to everything in a 20m radius. |

powers.name: Elemental Control
powers.description: Take full control of the elements
powers.content:
## Description Take full control of the elements | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Terrain Molder**
-You can make walls out of your element of choice.
-Fire: Deal 1d4 damage and cause burning when moved through
-Water: Slow movement by half when move through
-Earth: Can not be moved through and have 6 armor
-Air: Can not be moved or attacked through. Invisible. | | 1 | 1 | **Tentacles!**
-You can summon tentacles made out of your element. Can grapple enemies from a distance and keep then restrained.
-Water: Deal 1d4 true damage
-Fire: Deal 1d4 and cause burning
-Air: Deal 1d4 and are invisible
-Earth: Deal 1d6 and have 6 armor
| | 1 | 1 | **Elemental Blasts**
-You can fire blasts of your element that deal 1d6 damage and a bonus effect. |

powers.name: Florakinesis
powers.content:
## Description Guardian of the wilds | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | 1 | 1 | **Binding 1**
-You can cause grass to bind people's feet. You can cause this in a 20m range. This is a strength 7 check to escape | | 1 | 1 | **Control 1**
-You can control plants in a 10m radius |

powers.name: Laser
powers.content:
## Description An attack fast as light | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Laser Beam**
-You deal 1d4 to anything in sight range |

powers.name: Null
powers.content:
## Description The great equalizer | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Equalizer**
-You can cause one person in your range to become baseline human. This affects both of you. Your range is 10m. | | 1 | 2 | **Negate**
-You become immune to one damage type |

powers.name: Pocket Dimension
powers.content:
## Description Your own Dimension (T&C's apply) | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Inventory**
-You can store up to 3 items in a pocket dimension | | 1 | 1 | **Domain**
-You can make your pocket dimension overlap the land around you.
-You chose what is inside the dimension when you choose this power |

powers.name: Sillakinesis
powers.content:
## Description Full control over glass | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Glass Control**
-You can shatter glass in a 50m radius on command.
-You can control a stream of glass shards and cut things with them. They automatically hit in a 10m radius of you and deal 1d3 damage. |

powers.name: Sound Manipulation
powers.content:
## Description Silence Reigns | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Sonic Burst**
-You deal 1d4 damage that ignores external armour to enemies within 5m | | 1 | 1 | Silence
-You don't produce any sound unless you want to. |

powers.name: Telekinesis
powers.description: With the power of your MIND
powers.content:
## Description With the power of your MIND | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Tactile telekinesis**
-You can shove things in a 10m radius backwards 5m
-You can do a smarts check instead of a strength check for any strength check. | | 1 | 1 | **Telekinesis**
-You can lift up to 3 objects or people in a 15m radius around you. |

powers.name: Transmute
powers.content:
## Description The pinnacle of alchemy | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 Transmutation
-You can change the material of an item you are touching into your chosen material m |

powers.name: Clairvoyant
powers.content:
## Description All seeing | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **All seeing**
-You see everything in a 10m radius around yourself.
-This acts as truesight |

powers.name: Social
powers.content:
## Description Extravert | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Enhanced Socials**
-You gain +2 Social |

powers.name: Super Reflex
powers.content:
## Description Super Human Reflexes | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Enhanced Reflexes**
-You gain +2 reflex | | 1 | 1 | **Super Aim**
-You gain +3 to hitting enemies | | 2 | 1 | **Killing Streak 1**
-You gain +1 damage after every successful hit. |

powers.name: Super Smarts
powers.content:
## Description 12 steps ahead | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Enhanced Smarts**
-You gain +2 Smarts | | 1 | 1 | **Doctorate**
-You gain knowledge in a field of science and have advantage when it is relevant | | 1 | 1 | **Omni Proficient**
You can use any tool and drive any vehicle |

powers.name: Mind Control
powers.content:
## Description Take Control | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Taunt**
-You force an enemy to focus on you for a turn. This is a free action. | | 1 | 1 | **Puppeteer**
-You make an enemies movement actions. Once per turn. | | 1 | 1 | **Suggestion**
-You gain +4 to a persuasion check with a chance of being detected. The check is a smarts check of 8. |

powers.name: Mitosis
powers.content:
## Description Mini Me | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Clone 1**
-You can create a cloned duplicate of yourself that has all your powers and follows your commands. It does not have the clone power. |

powers.name: Statistician
powers.content:
## Description Take control of your Fate | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Lucky**
-Once per turn order, you can make a roll into a double advantage | | 1 | 1 | **Unluck**
-Once per turn order, you can make a roll into a double disadvantage |

powers.name: Tide
powers.description: Me and my endless tide of minions
powers.content:
## Description Me and my endless tide of minions | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Summon Tide minions**
-You can summon [[Basic Tide Minions]]
-You are capped to 5
-They have -2 to all rolls |

powers.name: Titan
powers.content:
## Description Your own gaurdian angel | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Summon Titan**
-You summon a large creature that has +2 to all rolls
-You are capped to 1 | | 2 | 1 | **Titan Body 1**
-Your Titan is made of stronger stuff.
-Gain another +2 to armor and Strength | | 2 | 1 | **Titan Size**
-Your Titan becomes massive. It's health and strength doubles |

powers.name: Flight
powers.description: Like a bird. Or not a bird
powers.content:
## Description Like a bird. Or not a bird | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Flight**
-You can move in any direction up to 5m and do not fall |

powers.name: Rocket
powers.content:
## Description Blasting off again | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Rocket**
-You fly 5m in a straight line dealing 1d8 damage to whatever you hit and half that damage to yourself |

powers.name: Skimmer
powers.content:
## Description Is the sky difficult terrain | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | | 1 | 1 | **Skimmer**
-You can move through difficult terrain unobstucted |

powers.name: SuperSpeed
powers.content:
## Description Fast as *Redacted* | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Superspeed**
-Your movespeed is doubled to 20m |

powers.name: Teleport
powers.content:
## Description Swapping Places | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Teleport**
-You can teleport yourself 10m instead of taking a movement action. Does not need line of sight. | | 1 | 1 | **Exchange**
-You can swap the places of two people in line of sight not including yourself as an action. | | 1 | 1 | **Value Exchange**
-You can swap an item you are touching with one of less value as an action. They keep the other items speed. |

powers.name: Cartoon
powers.content:
## Description Toon Force | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Rubber and glue**
You take have immunity to blunt damage |

powers.name: Elemental Body
powers.content:
## Description Rock Solid | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Rock Body**
-You can turn you body into stone. This gives you 2 armor and makes your melee attack a 1d6 | | 1 | 1 | **Water Body**
-You have resistance to slashing and piercing damage. | | 1 | 1 | **Flame Body**
-Your unarmed melee attacks cause you to deal stacks of burning. You gain immunity to fire damage. | | 1 | 1 | **Wind Body**
-Your jump height doubles and you take no fall damage. |

powers.name: Feral
powers.content:
## Description Werewolves and Vampires | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Cursed one basic**
You can switch to a mutated form that is visibly identifiable as an action. In this form you gain +1 to Ref ,Str and Armor but gain -1 to all other stats. |

powers.name: Kaiju
powers.content:
## Description Stomp Stomp Stomp | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Monstrous Size**
-You become twice the size of a human
-Your size gives you +2 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 2 | 1 | **Gaint Size**
-You become four times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +4 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 3 | 1 | **Titanic Size**
-You become eight times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +8 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 4 | 1 | **Kaiju Size**
-You become sixteen times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +16 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 2 | 1 | **Breath Weapon**
-Gain an elemental breath (fire/acid/frost/lightning/toxin/etc.)
-Range: 20m cone (40m at Titanic/Kaiju size)
-Damage: 1d8 + Size bonus (+2/+4/+8/+16)
-Cooldown: 3 turns
-Element adds extra effects (fire burns terrain, frost slows, lightning chains, acid ignores armor, etc.) | | 2 | 1 | **Tail Growth**
-Grow a powerful tail capable of sweeping attacks-Tail Strike: 1d6 + STR bonus
-Reach: 10m (scales with size)
-Can attack behind you or hit flanking enemies
-Tail Sweep (1/fight): Cone around you; enemies make Reflex 5 or fall prone | | 2 | 1 | **Wings**
-Grow functional kaiju wings-Monstrous/Giant: long jumps & gliding-Titanic: flight at 20m/turn-Kaiju: flight at 50m/turn-Wingbeat Shockwind: enemies within 10m must make Reflex 5 or be pushed 5m-Immune to fall damage | | 2 | 1 | **Spine Cannons**
-Dorsal spines fire biological artillery
-Range: 100m
-Damage: 1d10 (charge for +1d10 next turn)
-Modes: Piercing (ignore 6 armor), Explosive (5m radius, 1d6), Scatter (3 targets, 1d4 each)
-At Kaiju size, shots can damage armored vehicles | | 2 | 1 | **Electrical Organs**
-Develop massive bioelectric organs
-Shock Aura: 1 damage to enemies who touch you
-Lightning Pulse: 15m, 1d8 lightning, chains to 1 target (Reflex 5 to avoid)
-Nova Discharge (1/scene): 10m radius, 2d8 lightning, stun 1 turn (Durability 6 negates)
-Immune to electricity | | 2 | 1 | **Rage Evolution**
-You mutate as you take damage
-Each turn you are damaged, choose one: +1 STR, +1 DUR, +5m reach, +1 damage, +2 temporary armor
-Max +5 per category
-If you hit max during the fight, enter **Rage Form**:Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ +1d8 damage to all attacksÃ¢â‚¬Â¢ Movement doubledÃ¢â‚¬Â¢ Breath cooldown = 1 turn (if you have it)Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tail Sweep no cooldown (if you have tail)
-After fight: lose buffs and take -1 Social until calmed |

powers.name: Mutate
powers.content:
## Description
It GROWS!

| LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY                                                 |
| ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| 1     | 1      | You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 5  |
| 2     | 1      | You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 10 |
| 3     | 1      | You gain +2 strength every two turns of combat up to 20 |
| 4     | 2      | You gain +4 strength every two turns of combat up to 20 |

powers.name: Shapeshifter
powers.description: I'm made of plastic! It's fantastic
powers.content:
## Description I'm made of plastic! It's fantastic | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Wildshape**
-You can take the forms of animals smaller than humans but bigger than bugs. These have to be real animals | | 1 | 1 | **Changeling**
-You can take the appearance of people you have seen before | | 1 | 1 | **Natural Tools**
-You can shift your body into tools and weapons on command |

powers.name: Thistle
powers.content:
## Description The power to fight back | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | 1 | 1 | **Shell**
-Enemies that attack you take 2 damage | | 1 | 1 | **Hunker Down**
-You can Hunker down as an action, Consuming all your movement and rooting you in place until your next turn. When in this state you gain 2 armor and when attack you deal 2 damage back. |

powers.name: Vampire
powers.content:
## Description Bloodsucker | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Lifesteal**
-When you deal damage to an enemy heal for 4 health |

powers.name: Action Hero
powers.description: The powers of your average action movie protagonist
powers.content:
## Description The powers of your average action movie protagonist | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Hero's Limits**
-Every 3rd shot with a gun doesn't take ammo | | 1 | 1 | **Scene Maker**
-You can kick down doors with advantage | | 1 | 1 | **Last Stand**
You survive for 1 more turn after dying | | 2 | 1 | **Winner's Stand**
You can extend your time before dying by 1 if you kill an enemy |

powers.name: Assassin
powers.content:
## Description Stealth and murder based powers | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Sneak Attack**
-You deal double damage when attacking from stealth | | 1 | 1 | **Move unseen**
-You gain advantage when sneaking | | 1 | 1 | **Traceless**
-You are untraceable unless you allow otherwise | | 1 | 1 | **Corpse Dust**
-Things you kill fade to ashes before disappearing completely | | 2 | 7 | **From Dust to Dust**
-When you kill something or someone you can make them be forgotten from peoples memories |

powers.name: Boomeranger
powers.content:
## Description It always comes back | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Boomerang**
Every item you throw can be returned to you. | | 2 | 1 | **Ricochet 1**
-Thrown items hit 2 enemies in range before returning |

powers.name: Parry
powers.content:
## Description The power to get good | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Parry**
You can completely block an attack if you make a reflex check equal to the enemy roll -4 | | | 2 | 1 | **Reflect**
If you roll 2 higher than the enemy they take half the damage the attack would have done. | |

powers.name: Swordsman
powers.content:
## Description The way of the sword | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Blade Warrior**
-You gain +2 to hit and damage when attacking with a bladed melee weapon | | 2 | 1 | **Blade Master**
-You gain advantage when attacking with a bladed weapon |

powers.name: Wielder
powers.content:
## Description Powers for using items better | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 1**
-Items you touch gain 4 armour for 5 minutes | | 2 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 2**
-Items you touch gain 8 armour for 5 minutes | | 3 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 3**
-Items you touch gain 12 armour for 5 minutes | | 4 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 4**
-Items you touch gain 16 armour for 5 minutes |

powers.name: Bio-Horror Techie 1
powers.description: The ability to make bio horror items
powers.content: The ability to make bio horror Items

powers.name: Chemical Techie 1
powers.description: Gives you the ability make super chemicals
powers.content: Gives you the ability make super chemicals

powers.name: Divine Techie 1
powers.description: Lets you make super items with 2 different modes
powers.content: Lets you make super items with 2 different modes

powers.name: Fire Techie 1
powers.description: Add a short description for Fire Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Fire Techie.


Only this player can use the supertech unless specified otherwise.


# Lv1

Ignition Gloves: A pair of fire proof gloves with a lighter built in.
Cost: $10
Effects: Can ignite materials with touch. Reduces taken fire damage by 1.
Requirements: None


---
Firestarter Paste: A thick paste made of flammable materials that burn for a long time.
Cost: $10
Effects: Burns for 10 turns doing 1 damage per turn. Waterproof.
Requirements: None

---
Flashfuel Bottle: A small capsule filled with a volatile liquid.
Cost: $50
Effects: Creates a 5m radius blast of light and fire. Deals 1d4 damage. Targets must make a reflex check of 5 or be blinded for 1 turn.
Requirements: None

---
Basic Pyrotechnics Bench: A metal bench with ignition chambers, pressurized tanks, and controlled flame nozzles.
Cost: $100
Requirements: None

---
Incendiary Gel: A sticky gel that burns brightly
Cost: $100
Effects: Does 1d6 damage when thrown. Burns for 3 turns doing 1d4 damage a turn. Waterproof
Requirements: Basic Pyrotechnics Bench

---
Flame Nozzle: A weak flamethrower that can launch your chemicals further.
Cost: $1000
Effect: Increases the effective range of your chemicals to 20m.
Requirements: Basic Pyrotechnics Bench

---
Flame Suit: A insulated suit filled with fireproof materials.
Cost: $1000
Effect: Reduces taken fire damage by 4.

---
Thermite Bomb: A large bundle of vials and packages with wires coming out of it.
Cost: $1000
Effect: Causes an 10m explosion that coats everything in range with thermite. Coated enemies take 1d10 fire damage per turn for 10 turns.

powers.name: Fortification Techie
powers.description: Add a short description for Fortification Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Fortification Techie.

A tinker that can fortify buildings and locations with gun turrets and walls.

  

---
# Lv1


---
Reinforced Bodysuit: A skintight bodysuit with reinforced inlays.  
Cost: $10  
Effect: Gain +2 armor.  
Requirements: None

---
Concrete Sprayer: A gun with a tank that constantly makes concrete.  
Cost: $10  
Effects: Allows you to build walls or seal of doors in 1 turn. The walls have 20HP and 3 armor.  
Requirements: Noneâ€Œ

---
Concrete Foam Grenade: A small tank to foam that can harden to the strength of rock.
Cost: $10
Effects: Seal 5m area in concrete. The foam has no armor and only has 10hp.
Requirements: None

---
Fort Workbench: Allows you to build basic fortifications.  
Cost: $100  
Requirements: None

---
AutoTurret: A small gun turret that can be deployed in 1 turn.
Cost: $100
Hp:5
Size: 1/2 slot  
Effects: Automatically attacks the nearest enemy.  
Damage: 1D4  
Range: 50m  
Requirements: Fort Workbench.

---
Duel Turret: A gun turret with 2 barrels. Takes 2 turns to deploy.  
Cost: $500
Hp:10
Size: 1/2 slot  
Effects: Automatically attacks the nearest enemy.  
Damage: 2D4  
Range: 50m  
Requirements: Fort Workbench.

---
Reinforced Wall: A upgrade to any existing wall to make it tougher to destroy.  
Cost: $100  
Effects: Increase a walls health to 50 and it armor to 6  
Requirements: Concrete Sprayerâ€Œ

---
Entrenching Tool: A hyper advanced digging tool.
Cost: $100
Effect: Allows the player to dig a cubic meter every turn.
Requirements: None

---
Catapult Trap: A permanent stationary trap.
Cost: $100
Effect: Launches mooks/civvies up to 1d10 x10 meters if stepped on. Can only activate once per turn.
Requirements: None

---
Tar Pit Trap: A permanent stationary trap
Cost: $100
Effect: If a person is standing on the trap, they lose half of their actions
Requirements: Chemical Tinker Lv 1

---
Corrosive Gas Turret: A permanent stationary trap
Cost: $1000
Effect: Releases Piranha juice on everything that passes it.
Requirements: Chemical Tinker Lv 1

---
Fortified Basic Mech Suit:
Cost: $1000  
HP: 50  
Movespeed: 15m per turn  
Armor: 2  
Turret Slots: 2  
Effects: Doubles production speed for bigger mechs. (Doesn't stack) Increases strength to 10. Too Bulky to use normal or mech weapons. There is 1/5 chance that enemies hit the player instead of the mech. You can't deploy turrets from inside the mech. If equipped with a quick deploy mod instead of 1 turret you can deploy turrets from inside.
Requirements: Mech Tinker Lv1â€Œ

---
Shoulder mounted Machine Gun: A Browning machine gun strapped to a auto aiming system.
Cost: $500
Hp: 10
Size: 1 slot
Range: 50m
Effect: Targets Nearest enemy.
Damage: 3d8
Requirement: Mech tinker Lv 1

---
Size mod: Decreases the size of a turret by half.  
Cost: $1000  
Effect: Halves size of a turret.  
Requirements: Gadget tinker Lv 1.â€Œ

---
Quick Deploy Mod: Allows for quick Deployment of turrets.
Cost: $1000
Effect: Allows for the deployment of two turrets a turn.
Requirements: None

---
Turret Platform Drone: A large platform with propellers.
Cost: $1000
Hp: 20
Effect: This drone can carry 4 lv 1 turrets or 1 Lv 2 turret on it. It can also fly.
Requirements: Interface tinker.

---
# Lv2

---
Emplaced Turret: A more permanent automatic defense. Stronger than the AutoTurret. Takes 1 hour to deploy.  
Cost: $500
Hp:20
Size: 1 slot  
Effect: Automatically attacks the nearest enemy. Needs 1 day to remove from emplaced position.
Damage: 1D8  
Range: 100m  
Requirement: Fort Workbench.â€Œ

---
Stealth Mod: Upgrade a turret to be stealthed while inactive.
Cost: add half of price to item.â€Œ

---
Armor Mod: Give a item 5 Hp and 5 armor.
Cost: Double Cost of Item.â€Œ

---
Dart Trap: A permanent upgrade to a wall that lets it fire tranq darts.
Cost: $500
Effect: Automatically attacks any enemies that step in front of it. On a failed Durability roll of 5 the enemy is knocked out.
Range: 20m
Requirement: Fort Workbench.â€Œ

---
Hologram projector: A small device the size of a brick. Can create non-solid illusions.
Cost: $500
Hp:5
Size: 1/2 slot
Effect: Can project 1 non-solid illusion at a time. These illusions are destroyed if the projector is destroyed.
Range: 100m
Requirement: Fort Workbench.â€Œ

---
Fort Workshop: A upgrade to any room. Allows you to build more advanced turrets and fortifications.
Cost: $1000
Effect: Allows for more advanced projects and fortifications.
Requirement: Fort Workbench.â€Œ

---
AT Turret: A massive immoveable turret made to destroy vehicles.
Cost: $1000
Hp:50
Size: 1 slot
Effect: Targets nearest enemy vehicle.
Damage: 1D12
Range: 200m
Effect: Ignores armor.
Requirements: Fort Workshop.â€Œ

---
Artillery Turret: A massive gun that shoot to hit via an arc.
Cost: $1000
Hp: 30
Size: 1 slot
Effect: Can only shoot at artillery markers. Fires upon a artillery marker when activated. Deals 1d6 damage in a 25m radius. Doesn't need line of sight to attack.
Range: 1km
Requirements: Fort workshopâ€Œ

---
Artillery Marker: A hand sized device that activates the artillery turret.
Cost: $100
Effect: Is targeted by artillery turrets in range when activated. Allows for specifications when deployed by the tinker.
Range: 1km
Requirements: Fort workshop.â€Œ

---
Lethal Mod: Adjusts Auto and Duel Turrets to use lethal bullets.
Cost: 2x cost of item.
Effect: Doubled the damage of a turret, but the turrets can now cause death by attacking.
Requirements: Noneâ€Œ

---
Catapult Turret (small): Launches loaded items.
Cost: $1000
Size: 1 slot
Range: 400m
Damage: 1d8
Effect: Launches items.
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Catapult Turret (large): Launches loaded items.  
Cost: $10000
Size: 2 slots  
Range: 1km  
Damage: 1d20  
Effect: Launches items.  
Requirements: Fort Workshopâ€Œ

---
Blazing Mod: Adjust a turret to cause burning on hit.
Cost: 3x cost of item.
Effect: Targets hit by a turret with this mod is set ablaze for 3 turns, causing 1d8 damage per turn. This damage is lethal.
Requirements: Chemical Tinker Lv 2.â€Œ

---
Mech Deployment Canon: A massive Gun emplacement that can fire Basic mechs
Cost: $10000
Range: 1km
Effect: Allows the player to deploy a basic mech to a target in range.
Requirements: Mech Tinker Lv 2.â€Œ

---
Recall Mod: Allows the player to recall auto or dual turrets to him instantly.
Cost: $1000
Effect when installed on a turret it allows the player to teleport turrets back to them.
Requirements: Gadget tinker Lv 2.

---
Weakness Identifier mod: Allows the turret to find weaknesses in enemies,
Cost: $1000
Effect: Adds a flat 4 damage to the turret it is installed on.
Requirements: Interface Tinker Lv 2 and a active brain case.
  

---
# Lv3


---
Laser Turret: A industry grade laser mounted in a focusing lens.  
Cost: $10000
Hp: 10
Size: 2 slots  
Range: Line of sight  
Damage:1d8 per turn  
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Forcefield Projector: A small device that gives a set target a forcefield when attacked.  
Cost: $10000
Hp: 5
Size: 1 slot  
Range: 100m  
Effect: Blocks 5 attacks of any strength for a set target. Needs 1 hour to recharge after use.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop.

---
Hardlight Projector: A device that allows the player to make solid illusions.  
Cost:$10000
Hp: 5
Size: 1 slot  
Range: 100m  
Effect: Can create up to 5 solid illusions with 10hp and no armor.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Heavy Armor Mod: Allows the player to modify items with more hitpoints and some armor.  
Cost: Quadruple the cost of a item.  
Effect: Add 10 Hp to a item and give it 10 armor.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Burrow Mod: Allows the player to modify items to hide underground when not attacking.  
Cost: 5x cost of item  
Effect: Item becomes invincible when not active.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Repair Drone: A drone that can heal your items.  
Cost: $100000  
Effect: Repairs items in the room they are installed in. Heals 2hp every turn.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop.

---
Laser wall/door: A wall or door made of deadly lasers. Need a access code to disable.  
Cost: $10000  
Effect: Deals 10d10 damage to anything that tries to move past it.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Damage Mod: Doubles the damage of a item.  
Cost: 2x the items cost.  
Effect: damage of item 2x  
Requirements: Fort Workshop

---
Quick Deploy mod: Halves the deploy time of items.  
Cost: 4x the items cost.  
Effect: Halves the deploy time of items.  
Requirements: Fort Workshop.

---
# Lv4


---
Only one of the following can be built.


---
B.L.A.M. Canon: Ballistic Landmark Assisted by Markers. An Utterly massive gun emplacement the size of a small building.  
Cost: $1000000  
Effect: Uses Artillery markers to get accurate coordinates for bombardment. Shells are Built separately. A shell does 10d10 damage to everything in a 200 meter radius. Shells Cost $10000  
Range: 100km  
Requirements: Fort Workshop. Needs a buildings worth of space to build.â€Œ

---
Technocrete: A upgrade for all concrete you make. Filled with titanium
Cost: $100000
Effect: All concrete has 100hp and 10 armor.
Requirements: Fort Workbench.

powers.name: Gadget Techie 1
powers.description: Add a short description for Gadget Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Gadget Techie.

This ability allows the player to build Tinker Gadgets. Only this player can use the supertech unless specified otherwise.

# Lv1

---
Armored Tuxedo: A impressive looking suit that has armor plates sown into it.

Cost: $100
Effect: Gain +2 armor
Requirements: Noneâ€Œ

---
Concealed Knife: A knife concealed as a item of the players choice.


Cost: $100

Range: Touch

Damage: 1d6

Effect: Can do lethal damage.

Requirements: None.â€Œ

---
Tranquillizer dart: A small concealable dart of tranquillizer.


Cost: $100

Range: Touch or thrown

Damage: None

Effect: Enemy makes a durability check. Below a 6 causes them to be knocked out.

Requirements: None.â€Œ

---
Suitcase Workbench: A suitcase that contains all the tools needed to make more complex gadgets.


Cost: $100

Effect: Allows for more complex gadgets.

Requirements: None[br]â€Œ

---
Boot Concealed Bo staff: A collapsible bo staff that fits into the sole of a boot.


Cost: $100

Range: 5m

Damage: 1d8

Requirements: Suitcase Workbench.[br]â€Œ

---
Basic Exosuit: A skintight mechsuit that offers minor assistance.


Cost: $1000

Hp: 40

Armor: 2

Gadget slots: 2

Effect: Boosts strength by 4. Can have 2 gadgets built into it.

Requirements: Mech Suit Tinker Lv 1[br]â€Œ

---
Concealed Wrist Gas Spray: A tiny single use Gas can.


Cost: $100

Effect: Spray a single substance up to 5m.

Requirements: Chemical Tinker.[br]â€Œ

---
Mini Turret: A tiny turret used to distract enemies.


Cost: $10

Hp: 2

Damage: 1 per turn.

Requirements: Fort Tinker Lv 1[br]â€Œ

---
Nerve Disruptor: A bomb that targets nerves with electricity.


Cost: $100

Effect: One time use. Stuns enemies in a 5m radius for 3 turns.

Requirements: Interface Tinker Lv 1.[br]â€Œ

---
  

# Lv 2


---
Ceramic Collapsible gun: A small pistol that can't be detected by metal detectors.


Cost: $100

Range: 20m

Damage: 1d10

Requirements: Suitcase Workbench

[br]â€Œ

---
Multi Taser: A semi automatic taser.


Cost: $100

Range: 10m

Damage: 1d8 Non lethal damage.

Effect: Can be shot twice per action.

Requirement: Suitcase Workshop

[br]â€Œ

---
Violin Case rocket Launcher: A rocket launcher disguised as a violin case.


Cost: $1000

Range: 100m

Damage: 1d20 in a 5m radius.

Requirement: Suitcase Workshop

[br]â€Œ

powers.name: Interface Techie
powers.description: Add a short description for Interface Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Interface Techie.

This ability allows the player to build Tinker Chemicals. Only this player can use the supertech unless specified otherwise.

# Lv 1  


---
Control Helmet: A helmet that pushes metal rods into the brain of the wearer. Lets them control Interface tech.  

Cost: $100  
Control Slots: 3  
Effect: Allows the wearer to control compatible technology.  
Requirements: None

---
Hover Drone: Cheap but Expendable drones.  

Cost: $50  
Hp: 2  
Effect: Can fly.  
Item Slot: 1  
Requirements: None

---
Taser: A small cheap non-lethal weapon.  

Cost: $10  
Damage: 1d4 non lethal  
Range: 10m  
Requirements: None

---
Remote Workshop: A room that can be remote controlled to build items.  

Cost: $200  
Effect: Allows for the production of more advanced items.  
Requirements: None.

---
Audiovisual Kit: Allows you to see and hear through you drones.  

Costs: $100  
Effect: Allows for sight and hearing through a equipped drone.  
Requirements: Remote Workshop

---
Car drone: A tiny car that can slip under doors.  

Cost: $50  
Hp: 2  
Effect: Fits under doors.  
Item slot: 1  
Requirements: Remote Workshop

---
Chemical Tank: A capsule that contains the players chemical of choice for chemical tinker catalogue.  

Cost: $50  
Effect: Can be attached to drones. Releases the chemical on command.  
Requirements: Chemical Tinker lv 1

---
Turret drone: A small turret that runs on its legs.  

Cost: $200  
Hp: 5  
Damage: 1d4 per turn  
Range: 50m  
Requirements: Fort tinker Lv 1

---
Puppeteer Drone: A exoskeleton that can clamp to unwilling targets.  

Cost: $500  
Hp: 10  
Armor: 1  
Effect: Can attach to unconscious human targets to puppet them around. Still active after their awake.
Requirement: Mech Tinker Lv 1â€Œ

---
Roller Drone: Small ball like drones. They fit under doors.

Cost: $200
Hp:4
Armor: 3
Effect: Can fit under doors. Can trip enemies that set on them.
Requirement: Gadget Tinker.â€Œ

---
# Lv2  



---
Brain Extractor: A chair that looks suspiciously like a dentist chair.  

Cost: $1000  
Effect: Removes brain from a target unconscious human and puts them in brain cases.  
Requirement: Remote workshop

---
Brain Case: A jar with life support systems.  

Cost: $1000  
Effect: Sustains a contained brain. Can be equipped with a Audiovisual system and a Control Helmet.  
Requirement: Remote Workshop

---
Control booster: Lets you set automatic commands for drones.  

Cost: $1000  
Effect: When equipped to a brain case with a brain. It lets the player set automatic controls for up to 10 drones.  
Requirement: Remote Workshop

---
Case Carrier: A set of tank tracks with a drone controller.  

Cost: $100  
Hp: 10  
Movespeed: 5m per turn  
Effect: Can carry 1 brain case and move it freely.  
Requirement: Remote Workshop

---
Hypnotizer: A ray gun that affects the targets brain.  

Cost: $1000  
Range: 10m  
Effect: Roll 1d10, on a 8 or higher a mook is hypnotized and falls unconscious.  
Requirements: Remote Workshop

---
Brain Clone: Wipe the memories of a brain and implant your own.

Cost: 1 Occupied Brain Case.
Effect: Gives the player a second chance at live if they die. Stays inactive until current brain expires.
Requirements: 1 Occupied Brain Case.

---
Nerve Disruptor: Causes paralysis in a target creature.  

Cost: $1000  
Range: 20m  
Damage: None  
Effect: Causes paralysis in target enemy on a roll higher than 5.  
Requirements: Remote Workshop

---
Knockout Gas: A very potent necrotic in gas form.  

Cost: $100  
Effect Single use. Knocks out every one in a 5m radius unless they roll higher than 8 on a durability check.  
Requirement: Chemical tinker Lv 2

---
Disrupter turret: A turret equipped with a nerve disrupter.  

Cost: $1000
Range: 20m
Effect: Automatically targets enemies nearby. Causes paralysis in target enemy on a roll higher than 5.  
Requirement: Fort Tinker Lv 2

---
Mecha Carrier: A bipedal mech that can carry brains.

Cost: $1000
Hp: 100
Armor: 4
Weapon Slots: 1
Effect: Gain all original stats. Allows brains to use hands. Can use mech weapons.  
Requirement: Mech Tinker Lv 2

---
Neural Chips: A chip that can be implanted in unsuspecting people.

Cost: $1000
Effect: Take control of a mook or civvy over a 12 hour period.
Requirement: Gadget Tinker Lv 2

  
---
# Lv 3  

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
Lv 4

powers.name: Mech Techie
powers.description: Add a short description for Mech Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Mech Techie.

This ability allows the player to build mechsuits. Only this player can use the supertech unless specified otherwise.

  

  ****
Lv1
---


**Bodysuit**: A skintight bodysuit that doesn't provide any protection. Makes you look slightly cooler. Necessary to use any of the mechs.

Cost: $10

Requirements: none[br]â€Œ

---


**Big Pistol**: A Comically large pistol that can be stored inside mechs as a emergency sidearm.

Cost: $10

Range: 10m

Damage: 1D10

Requirements: None[br]â€Œ

---


**Mech Rifle**: A massive gun that is made to be used by the mechs. The gun can still be used by people but only as a 2 handed weapon.

Cost: $100

Damage: nD10 n = to the size of the mech that is being used. n = 1 is no mech.

Range: 100m

Requirements: None[br]â€Œ

---


**Ram**: A melee weapon that can take a beating. Mostly made of cheap materials like concrete and metal.

Cost: $100

Damage: 1D6 + Strength

Range: Touch

Requirements: None[br]â€Œ

---


**Mech Workbench**: A bench with tools to build cheap mechsuits and better weapons. Needs 1 hour to pack or unpack.

Cost: $100

Requirements: None[br]â€Œ

---


**Basic Mechsuit**: A small mechsuit that seats 1 person and still fits through normal doors. Basically just there to help build bigger mechs or carry heavy objects/weapons.

Cost: $100

HP: 50

Movespeed: 15m per turn

Armor: 1

Weapon slots: 2

Effects: Doubles production speed for bigger mechs. (Doesn't stack) Can carry Mech weapons one handed. Increases strength to 10. There is a 1/4 chance that the enemy hits the player instead of the mech.

Requirements: Mech Workbench.[br]â€Œ

---


**Flamethrower**: A barrel to launch liquid pain at your enemies with.

Cost: $500

Range:10m

Damage: 1d4 in a 10m cone.

Effect: Causes burning. Burning deals 1 damage per turn.

Requirements: Mech Workbench[br]â€Œ

---


**Shield**: A massive Metal slab welded to the arm of a mech.

Cost: $500

Weapon slots: 1

Effect: +1 armor to your mech.

Requirements: Mech Workbench[br]â€Œ

---


**Rotary Concrete Foam Launcher**: A grenade launcher that fires Concrete foam grenades.

Cost: $1000

Range: 50m

Effect: Launches Concrete foam grenades.

Requirements: Fortification Tinker Lv 1[br]â€Œ

---


**Mech Sprayer**: A massive hose like sprayer built into a mech.

Cost: $1000

Effect: Uses a Weapon slot. Allows the mech to contain and spray chemicals safely.

Requirements: Chemical Tinker Lv 1Â 

---

**Mulcher Mod**: A grinding mouth device that grinds organic waste into bio slurry.

Cost: $1000

Effect: Turns organic waste into random bio-samples

Requirements: Bio Horror Techie Lv 1



---
Lv2
---


**Rocket Launcher**: A one time use weapon that fires unguided rocket. The rocket can be replaced during a short rest.  
Cost: $500  
Amount: n. n = to the size of the mech that is being used. n = 1 is no mech.  
Damage: 1D20 in a 5m radius.  
Range: 200m  
Requirements: Mech Workbench.  

---


Grapple hook Cannon**: A grappling hook that can only be equipped on basic mechs. Allows the mech to traverse up walls. Can also be used to drag enemies to you.  
Cost: $500  
Damage: 1D4  
Range: 100m  
Effects: Allows mech to move up walls and buildings.  
Requirements: Mech Workbench.[br]â€Œ  

---


**Armor Mod**: A upgrade to a mechsuit that takes away 1 weapon slot, but increases the armor of a mech by 2  
Cost: $100  
Requirement: Mech workbench.[br]â€Œ

---


**Mech Transformation Mod:** For 1 weapon slot you can make a mech have the ability to turn into a car.

Cost: $1000

Effect: The mech can now turn into a car.

Requirement: Mech Workbench

---


**Mech Bay:**Â A upgrade that can be made to any building that a car can enter or leave. Allows for the construction of bigger mechs and better weapons.  
Cost: $10000  
Requirement: None

---


**Novice Mechsuit**: A mechsuit that seat 1 person. The size of a car. This mechsuit is built for more than just support and it shows.

Cost: $10000

HP: 100

Movespeed: 10m per turn

Armor: 3

Weapon slots: 3

Effects: Increases strength to 15.

Requirements: Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


**Laser Cannon**: A Massive laser cannon that has unlimited range.

Cost: $1000

Range: Vision

Damage: 1D10

Effects: Double damage to unarmored targets.

Requirements: Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


**Drill**: A Drill that can be used by mechs. Allows for the construction of underground complexes. Can be used as a improvised mellee weapon.

Cost: $1000

Range: Touch

Damage: nD10 damage. n= the level of mech being used. n = 1 is no mech.

Effects: Allows for the digging of tunnels and underground chambers.

Requirements: Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


**Trophy System**: A small laser system that destroys up to 3 physical ranged attacks every turn. Takes up 1 weapon slot.

Cost: $1000

Range: 100m

Damage: None

Effects: Can destroy up to 3 physical ranged attacks per turn.

Requirements: Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


**Cargo Bay Mod**: A system that allows the mech to carry another person or something of similar size. Takes up 1 weapon slot.

Cost: $100

Effect: Allows a Mech to carry something inside of it.

Requirement: Mech Bay; Mech must be bigger than basic.[br]â€Œ

---
Lv3
---
****
**Mechs for dummies:**Â A manual that after being used allows for another person to use the mechs.  
Cost: $100  
Effect: allows 1 person to be able to use mechs.  
Requirement: None
****
Flight Mod: A mod that allows your mechs to fly.  
Cost: $ 1000  
Effect: Allows any mech to have vertical movement

Requirement: Mech Bay

---
â€Œ


Massive Mech Bay: A Building that needs to be built underground or in a big warehouse. It allows for the production of the biggest mechs and Strongest weapons.

Cost: $100000

Requirement: None

---


Advanced Mech: A massive 1 person mech. As big as a small building.

Cost: $100000

HP: 1000

Movespeed: 20m per turn.

Armor: 10

Weapon Slots: 5

Effects: Increases your strength to 50

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay.[br]â€Œ

---


MIRV Missle launcher: A massive cluster bomb launcher that saturates a massive area with explosions.

Cost: $10000

Range: 1km

Damage: Hits every target within 250m radius of targeted area for 1D10 damage.

Requirement: Massive Mech Bay.[br]â€Œ

---


Gatling Gun: A gun that shoots bullets at a ridiculous speed.

Cost: $10000

Range: 200m

Damage: 2nD4 n = to your mech level. n = 1 is no mech.

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


Mech Dropship: A aircraft that can carry up to 10 basic mechsuits.

Cost: $10000

Movespeed: 100m per turn

HP: 150

Armor: None

Weapon slot: 1

Effect: Can carry up to 10 basic mechsuits.

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


Thermite Cannon: A gun that fires thermite that deals damage per turn.

Cost: $10000

Damage: 1D8 per turn for 10 turns.

Range: 200m

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


Potable Shield Projector: A force field projector that can be used for area denial by deploying walls.

Cost: $10000

HP:20

Effect: Allows the mech to project up to 3 walls with 20 hp each.

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


Ai Mod: Allows a mech to control itself

Cost: $10000

Effect: The Player can control any mech with this mod from another mech.

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay[br]â€Œ

---


Chest Mounted Mass Driver: A massive Railgun built into the chest of a mech.

Cost: $100000

Range: Vision

Damage: 1D100

Effect: Can only be fired once a day.

Requirements: Massive Mech Bay

---


Lv4
---


Only one of the following can be built.[br]â€Œ

---


Mech Titan: A Massive Mech the size of a skyscraper.

Cost: $1000000

Movespeed: 50m per turn

HP: 1000

Armor: 20

Weapon Slots: 10

Effect: This Mech has to be built underground. When it emerges it destroys anything above it.

Requirement: Built underground, Only one can exist.[br]â€Œ

---


Mechanical Mecha Workshop: A entire workshop on legs. Counts as a Massive Mech Bay, Mech Bay and Mech Workbench.

Cost: $1000000

Movespeed: 50m per turn.

HP: 1000

Armor: 20

Weapon slot: 2

Effect: This mech can carry any amount of other mechs and rapidly deploy them.

Requirement: Must be built underground.

powers.name: Modular Items Techie
powers.description: Add a short description for Modular Items Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Modular Items Techie.

Only you can use these items unless specified otherwise.
- The player chooses **up to 3 modules** from this list.
- They glue them together with a base chassis (free).
- The final weapon gains **all ranges, damages, and effects** from every attached module.
- If two modules give different ranges, it uses the **longest**.
- If two modules give different damage dice, all dice apply.
- If the weapon has both melee and ranged modules, it becomes **hybrid**.

# Lv1

Long Barrel: A extended long barrel to increase accuracy.
Cost: $100
Range: 30m
Damage: 1d4
Effect: +2 to hit with ranged attacks

---
Short Barrel: A small barrel that helps with quick draw.
Cost: $100
Range: 10m
Damage: 1d6
Effect: You can switch to this weapon as a free action 

---
Split Shot: A mod that splits bullets into a scatter effect.
Cost: $100
Damage: 1d4
Effect: Your attacks are split randomly across all the enemies in a cone.

---
Stabilizer Grip: A gyroscope built into the handle of the weapon.
Cost: $100
Effect: Consecutive attacks against the same enemy give +1 to hit.

---
Shock Battery: A battery that discharges to stun the enemy
Cost: $100
Range: Melee
Effect: Once per turn. You stun an enemy on hit with a dc 6 durability save

powers.name: Self Augment Techie
powers.description: Add a short description for Self Augment Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Self Augment Techie.

powers.name: Water Techie
powers.description: Add a short description for Water Techie.
powers.content:
## Description
Add a short description for Water Techie.

_Only this player can use the supertech unless specified otherwise._

---

Hydro Gloves: A pair of rubberized gloves with micro-pumps and moisture collectors.  
**Cost:** $10  
**Effect:** Lets you extract water from the air or liquids. Produces up to **1 liter per turn**. Reduces taken water/cold damage by 1.  
**Requirements:** None

---
Slickfoam Capsule: A capsule filled with expanding slick-foam.  
**Cost:** $10  
**Effect:** Creates a **5m patch** of hyper-slippery foam.

- Anyone moving through must roll Reflex 5 or fall prone.
    
- Foam lasts 5 turns.  
    **Requirements:** None
    

---

Chillburst Vial: A vial of fast-evaporating cryo-fluid.  
**Cost:** $50  
**Effect:** On breaking, creates a **5m burst of freezing mist**.

- Deals **1d4 cold damage**.
    
- Reflex 5 or movement is halved for 1 turn.  
    **Requirements:** None
    

---

Basic Hydromechanics Bench: A reinforced metal bench with pumps, pressure lines, freeze chambers, and filters.  
**Cost:** $100  
**Requirements:** None

---

Cryo Slush Grenade: A metal sphere filled with rapidly expanding cryo-slush.  
**Cost:** $100  
**Effect:** On detonation creates a **5m frost patch**.

- Immediate **1d6 cold damage**
    
- Targets must pass a Durability 5 check or take **1d4 cold damage for 3 turns**  
    **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench
    

---

Pressure Nozzle: A high-pressure sprayer attachment for projecting chemicals.  
**Cost:** $1000  
**Effect:** Increases range of your liquids and chemicals to **20m**.  
**Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench

---

Insulated Diving Suit: A heavy-duty diving suit with internal pressure equalization.  
**Cost:** $1000  
**Effect:**

- Reduces taken **cold and water damage by 4**
    
- Allows underwater breathing for **1 hour**  
    **Requirements:** None
    

---

Water Lance Charge: A hydraulic explosive that releases a compressed jet of cutting water.  
**Cost:** $1000  
**Effect:** Creates a **10m linear water blast**.

- Deals **2d6 cutting damage**
    
- Ignores **2 armor**
    
- Pierces through soft cover  
    **Requirements:** Basic Hydromechanics Bench
